import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import AdminPanel from '../components/Admin/AdminPanel'; const AdminPage = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); return (
{/* Header */}
Gallery Pavilion Admin Panel
Admin: {user?.firstName}
{/* Main Content */}

Admin Dashboard

Manage photographer approvals and platform analytics

{/* Quick Stats */}
{[ { label: 'Pending Approvals', value: '0', color: 'bg-yellow-500' }, { label: 'Active Photographers', value: '0', color: 'bg-green-500' }, { label: 'Total Galleries', value: '0', color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { label: 'Total Photos', value: '0', color: 'bg-purple-500' } ].map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* Admin Actions */}

Pending Photographers

Review and approve new photographer accounts

All Galleries

View and manage all photographer galleries

Analytics

View platform usage and statistics

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Admin Activity

No recent admin activity

Admin actions will appear here
); }; export default AdminPage;
